short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There is a brave panda, in order to return home to celebrate Christmas with his family, decided to adventure with

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There is a brave panda, in order to return home to celebrate Christmas with his family, decided to adventure with tireless running. Tap the buttons to jump and shoot on mobile or pad, press space bar to shoot and up arrow key to jump on PC. Collect the gold coins, step by step towards the goal.
